item.title: Siteman - Crabapple - integration spec (DRAFT) - 1
item.description: Background Overview Page Massive Promo Article with headers Page template Page Editorial collection Proposal A (sectionParameters and editorialParameters) Header Url: /brands/comedy-central/distribution-points/cc-jokes/pages/header { "brandCode": "comedy-central", "dpCode": "cc-jokes", "pageType": "header", "pageTemplate": "header", "sections": [ { "sectionCode": "generic-header", "sectionParameters": { "name": "Comedy Central Jokes", "url": "http://jokes.cc.com/" } }, { "sectionCode": "menu", "editorialParameters": { "menus": [ { "name": "Homepage", "url": "/" }, { "name": "About", "url": "/about" }, { "name": "Series", "url": "/series", "submenu": [ { "name": "Teen Wold", "url": "/series/teen-wolf", "submenu": [ { "name": "Best moments", "url": "/series/teen-wolf/best-moments" }, { "name": "Latest", "url": "/series/teen-wolf/latest" } ] }, { "name": "CatFish", "url": "/series/catfish" } ] } ] } } ], "links": [ { "href": "/brands/comedy-central/distribution-points/cc-jokes/pages/header", "ref": "self" } ] } series-homepage body for given context Url: /brands/comedy-central/distribution-points/cc-jokes/pages/series-homepage?

item.title: Weekly Crabapple Working Session
item.description: Weekly Crabapple Working Session - 2017-10-04 Meeting notes For time travel we should use ISO8601 standard (timezone support) Fallback: if we don’t have “override” for given context, we should do fallback to default pageType and do not include context in the responce - it would be helpful for debugging Naming conventions: authoring and live vs draft and final - which one should we use? I opt for authoring and live.

item.title: Sync up on Section Template solution
item.description: Sync up on Section Template solution - 2017-10-03 Use case: sometimes there is section that needs some editorialization, but it does not have any editorial rules. Example: joke on jokes.cc.com needs only content ref. Some section parameters should be read-only or invisible for producers (they should be only for dev-admin) For the Paramount Launch we should go with Individual Section - it could be easier to implement, and less prone to errors - need to confirm it with Rafał.

item.title: Weekly Crabapple Working Session
item.description: List of topics Mockups for Paramount Site Url: http://www.paramountnetwork.vmn.io Wires are not ready - Paramount Site is still in design phase John said that he saw and made more complicated modules for different pages and modules for Paramount are not very complex and we should be able to map everything. Question: How we could commit to something without knowing how should it look like? Answer: Crabapple is in the same situation.

item.title: Siteman - notes
item.description: List page templates GET /distribution-points-templates/{dpTemplateCode}/pages-templates GET /distribution-points-templates/mtv-website-main/pages-templates { "data": [ { "pageTemplateCode": "homepage", "instructions": "homepage instruction", "links": [ { "rel": "self", "href": "http://localhost:8080/distribution-points-templates/mtv-website-main/pages-templates/homepage" } ] }, { "pageTemplateCode": "series-homepage", "links": [ { "rel": "self", "href": "http://localhost:8080/distribution-points-templates/mtv-website-main/pages-templates/series-homepage" } ] }, // ... ], "links": [ { "rel": "self", "href": "http://localhost:8080/distribution-points-templates/mtv-website-main/pages-templates" } ] } Note: should be ordered by “position”. Get page template details GET /distribution-points-templates/{dpTemplateCode}/pages-templates/{pageTemplateCode} GET /distribution-points-templates/mtv-website-main/pages-templates/homepage { "dpTemplateCode": "mtv-website-main", "pageTemplateCode": "homepage".
